title: Panoramic Map of the City of Cairo Showing Principal Streets and Points of Interest
creator: American University in Cairo
description: Map showing AUC's campus on Tahrir Square with popular tourist spots in Cairo from a 1923-24 AUC promotional booklet. The bird's eye view is from Ramses Station.
subject: Cairo (Egypt) -- Maps
source: From: Panoramic Map of the City of Cairo Showing Principal Streets and Points of Interest
